item.title: Our AWS bill is ~ 2% of revenue. Here's how we did it
item.description: Leveraging AWS lightsail to achieve a minimal AWS bill

item.title: Defining Resources — IdentityServer4 1.0.0 documentation
item.description: The ultimate job of an OpenID Connect/OAuth token service is to control access to resources.

item.title: Overview — IdentityServer4 1.0.0 documentation
item.description: The quickstarts provide step by step instructions for various common IdentityServer scenarios. They start with the absolute basics and become more complex - it is recommended you do them in order.

item.title: Resource Access in IdentityServer4 v4 and going forward
item.description: In my last post I alluded to the tension between real-world token-based security architectures, the OAuth 2.0 scope model, JWT access tokens and the audience claim. We went through a couple of iter…
